hypothesis_content.title: Post-QT Liquidity Pump Momentum Trade
hypothesis_content.statement: Following the announced end of Quantitative Tightening (QT) and $13.5B liquidity injection, BTC will exhibit a 48-hour momentum surge exceeding 8% from announcement time, as new liquidity seeks high-beta crypto assets before traditional markets fully price it.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Historical Fed liquidity pivots (2019, 2020) triggered immediate crypto rallies as digital assets act as liquidity sponges. The October 'liquidity crash' created pent-up demand, making the system hypersensitive to new liquidity signals.
entry_conditions: Official Fed announcement confirming QT end AND $13.5B+ liquidity injection timestamped
BTC 15-min candle closes above its 20-period EMA within 2 hours post-announcement
Total crypto market cap (excluding stablecoins) shows >1.5% increase from pre-announcement level

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain from entry price OR 48 hours after entry, whichever comes first
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC fails to gain >3% within 24 hours post-announcement OR shows immediate sell-the-news reaction (>2% drop within 4 hours)
